field.label: Network Address
field.help: Provide an IPv4 address (Interface or Virtual IP) that is defined in OPNsense(Default: 0.0.0.0 - All)

field.label: Protocol
field.help: Set the protocol of the transport (Default: UDP)

field.label: Local Network
field.help: Network to consider local used for NAT purposes (Default: "")
field.hint: Enter a valid IPv4 address with CIDR mask. e.g. 127.0.0.1/8.

field.label: External Media Address
field.help: External IP address to use in RTP handling (default: "")
field.hint: Enter a valid IPv4 address with CIDR mask. e.g. 127.0.0.1/8.

field.label: External Signaling Address
field.help: External IP address to use for SIP signaling (default: "")
field.hint: Enter a valid IPv4 address with CIDR mask. e.g. 127.0.0.1/8.

field.label: External Signaling Port
field.help: External port to use for SIP signaling (default: "")
field.hint: Enter a valid IPv4 address with CIDR mask. e.g. 127.0.0.1/8.

field.label: Additional Options
field.help: These lines will be added to the end of this AoR section. One option per line in the format of ConfigOption=Value
